parameters.name: Fwd
parameters.description: True makes the end of the extrusion a translation of the reference surface in the forward direction, false makes the end of the extrusion a translation of the reference surface in the reverse direction

parameters.name: ValIn
parameters.description: True to enable the translate surface setting, false to disable it

title: IExtrudeFeatureData2.SetTranslateSurface
description: Sets the translate surface setting for this extrude feature.
signature:
void SetTranslateSurface( 
   System.Boolean
Fwd
,
   System.Boolean
ValIn
)

parameters.name: Fwd
parameters.description: True makes the end of the extrusion a translation of the reference surface in the forward direction, false makes the end of the extrusion a translation of the reference surface in the reverse direction

parameters.name: ValIn
parameters.description: True to enable the translate surface setting, false to disable it
